content:
Don't forget to register for the January 13-15 Connectathon -- http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/01/?ref=signature
Early bird registration deadline is December 30, 2020.

Hey @Saul Kravitz.. On the landing page of January 13-15 Connectathon Wiki, I do not see a track for PDEX Plan Net. Is it part of another track? I am looking at this page - https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Connectathon+26
Hi @Abhishek -- Plan-Net, Formulary, and PDEX are under a Patient API track -- https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=97468967

PDEX Plan-Net participants - We uploaded some 'updated' Plan-Net scripts in Touchstone for those who are ready to test. They have some of the recent updates discussed among the track participants over the last few months. Link: https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/testdefinitions?selectedTestGrp=/FHIRSandbox/DaVinci/FHIR4-0-1-Test/PDEX/PlanNet&activeOnly=false&contentEntry=TEST_SCRIPTS

Please contact us at touchstone_support@aegis.net if you need assistance or ping us back on our #touchstone stream.
Have there been any break-out sessions for Provider yet? Have yet to receive any invitations.

Connectivity for Optum's Provider Directory solution:
Optum:

Authenticated server:
R4: https://fhir.stg.flex-nonprod.optum.com/R4/
metadata (CapabilityStatement): https://fhir.stg.flex-nonprod.optum.com/R4/metadata
Requires registration through the UHC portal: https://portal.stg.flex-nonprod.optum.com/homepage

Non-authenticated server:
R4: https://appnameformularlyconnectathonjan2021.azurewebsites.net/R4/
metadata (CapabilityStatement): https://appnameformularlyconnectathonjan2021.azurewebsites.net/R4/metadata

@Saul Kravitz FYI
